channel.title: Newsletter on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: Sub Topic Summaries for Google Meet; Speech Recognition for Dutch English Accent
item.description: In this edition: [Product] Google Meet Gets More Focused Summaries with Sub-Topics!

item.title: SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy; Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Improvements [Product] Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Reaches New Accuracy Milestones The SeaVoice Speech-to-Text engine has recently broken through to new heights, placing in the top three when compared to a variety of STT systems from companies like Azure and Google, and outperforming Google Chirp.

item.title: SeaX Voicemail; SeaVoice on Bias Breakers; New SeaX Messaging Notifications
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaX Introduces Voicemail Automations [Highlight] Seasalt.

item.title: Discord Bot New Languages; SeaX Messaging Click Tracking; SeaX-HubSpot Integration
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports New Languages [Product] SeaX Messaging Introduces Click Tracking [Product] Auto Sync Call Records from SeaX to HubSpot SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports New Languages We are excited to announce that we have added 10 new languages to our speech-to-text support for the SeaVoice Discord bot!

item.title: CoPilot for Google Meet; SeaVoice Discord Bot Tutorial; ChatGPT Contact Centers
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet [Highlight] Refreshed Video Tutorial for SeaVoice Discord STT/TTS Bot [Webinar] ChatGPT-Powered Contact Centers: Transforming Customer Support in the Digital Age SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet (available for English/Chinese) We released SeaMeet on Google Workspace Marketplace!

item.title: SeaVoice Nails Code Switching; Discord Server Boosting; ChatGPT Ecommerce Bot
item.description: In this edition: [Highlight] SeaVoice Nails Code Switching in Automatic Speech Recognition [Product] Discord - Your server has been boosted!

item.title: WhatsApp Auto Reply; Leveraging GPT for CX; Insights from United CX
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaX Contact Center Adds Auto Reply for WhatsApp [Webinar] Seasalt.

item.title: SeaVoice Discord Bot Helps Moderators;Segment your Customers in Bulk Messaging Outreach
item.description: In this edition: [Product] SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel [Product] Segment Your Customers in Bulk Messaging with Labels SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel The SeaVoice Discord bot introduces two exciting new commands to tailor its use to your preference!

item.title: Discord TTS Case Study;Chinese Support for Discord Bot;NearMe Push Messages
item.description: In this edition: [Product] Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports Chinese [Highlight] Capture Users After They Leave Webchats with Near Me Messaging Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study Our SeaVoice Discord bot has now been added to nearly 800 servers, and is used daily to provide STT and TTS to Discord users.

item.title: Twilio/Seasalt.ai go to APJ; UnTechCon on Discord; Auto Dialer
item.description: In this edition: [News] Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ [Conference] UnTechCon Transcribes Large Discord Audio Channels with SeaVoice [Product] SeaX Highlight â€“ Auto Dialer Seasalt.
